parameters.name: NumberOfNotes
parameters.description: Number of notes in this drawing view

title: IView.IGetNotes
description: Gets the notes in this drawing view.

parameters.name: NumberOfNotes
parameters.description: Number of notes in this drawing view

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of notes VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Use this method to obtain the array of notes all at once instead of calling
IView::GetFirstNote
and then repeatedly calling
INote::GetNext
to obtain the remaining notes on this drawing view.
Call
IView::GetNoteCount
before calling this method to get NumberOfNotes.
